name: Blood Grenade
description: Blood Grenade is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.

name: Dust of Appearance
description: Dust of Appearance is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: One may hide visage, but never volume.

name: Faerie Fire
description: The Faerie Fire is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

name: Smoke of Deceit
description: Smoke of Deceit is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

name: Sentry Ward
description: Sentry Ward is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

name: Tango
description: The Tango is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

name: Observer Ward
description: Observer Ward is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

name: Gauntlets of Strength
description: Gauntlets of Strength are an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: Enchanted Mango
description: Enchanted Mango is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables. They may also be dug up with a  Trusty Shovel.
lore_description: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

name: Iron Branch
description: Iron Branch is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

name: Town Portal Scroll
description: The Town Portal Scroll is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: What a hero truly needs.

name: Clarity
description: Clarity is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

name: Aghanim's Shard
description: Aghanim's Shard is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.
lore_description: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

name: Slippers of Agility
description: Slippers of Agility is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: Healing Salve
description: The Healing Salve is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables. They may also be dug up with a  Trusty Shovel.
lore_description: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

name: Bottle
description: Bottle is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Consumables.

name: Mantle of Intelligence
description: Mantle of Intelligence is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: Circlet
description: Circlet is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: Belt of Strength
description: Belt of Strength is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: Band of Elvenskin
description: Band of Elvenskin is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: Diadem
description: Diadem is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.

name: Crown
description: Crown is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

name: Quelling Blade
description: Quelling Blade is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

name: Robe of the Magi
description: Robe of the Magi is an item bought at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: Blade of Alacrity
description: Blade of Alacrity is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: Ogre Axe
description: Ogre Axe is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: Staff of Wizardry
description: Staff of Wizardry is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Attributes.
lore_description: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: Infused Raindrops
description: Infused Raindrops is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

name: Orb of Venom
description: Orb of Venom is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

name: Ring of Protection
description: Ring of Protection is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: Blades of Attack
description: Blades of Attack is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: Chainmail
description: Chainmail is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: Quarterstaff
description: Quarterstaff is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: Blight Stone
description: Blight Stone is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

name: Helm of Iron Will
description: Helm of Iron Will is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: Gloves of Haste
description: Gloves of Haste are an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: Broadsword
description: Broadsword is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: Javelin
description: Javelin is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

name: Ring of Regen
description: Ring of Regen is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: Fluffy Hat
description: Fluffy Hat is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.

name: Boots of Speed
description: Boots of Speed is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: Wind Lace
description: Wind Lace is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

name: Mithril Hammer
description: Mithril Hammer is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: Cloak
description: Cloak is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: Blitz Knuckles
description: Blitz Knuckles is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

name: Sage's Mask
description: Sage's Mask is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: Ghost Scepter
description: Ghost Scepter is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

name: Claymore
description: Claymore is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Equipment.
lore_description: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: Magic Stick
description: Magic Stick is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: Voodoo Mask
description: Voodoo Mask is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

name: Gem of True Sight
description: Gem of True Sight is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: Not one thrall creature of the depths,

name: Vitality Booster
description: Vitality Booster is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: Shadow Amulet
description: Shadow Amulet is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

name: Blink Dagger
description: Blink Dagger is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

name: Ring of Health
description: Ring of Health is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling’s corpse.

name: Void Stone
description: Void Stone is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: Morbid Mask
description: Morbid Mask is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Miscellaneous.
lore_description: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

name: Talisman of Evasion
description: Talisman of Evasion is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: Point Booster
description: Point Booster is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: Energy Booster
description: Energy Booster is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: Ultimate Orb
description: Ultimate Orb is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: Reaver
description: Reaver is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: Cornucopia
description: Cornucopia is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
bonus:
+5 Health Regeneration
+2 Mana Regeneration
+7 Attack Damage

name: Platemail
description: Platemail is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: Demon Edge
description: Demon Edge is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: Eaglesong
description: Eaglesong is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: Null Talisman
description: Null Talisman is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories. It has 2 levels and automatically upgrades based on the in-game clock.
lore_description: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
bonus:
+2/4 Strength
+2/4 Agility
+5/10 Intelligence
+3%/6% Mana
+0.75/1.5 Mana Regeneration

name: Bracer
description: Bracer is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories. It has 2 levels and automatically upgrades based on the in-game clock.
lore_description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
bonus:
+5/10 Strength
+2/4 Agility
+2/4 Intelligence
+0.75/1.5 Health Regeneration
+2/4 Attack Damage

name: Hyperstone
description: Hyperstone is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: Sacred Relic
description: Sacred Relic is an item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: Orb of Corrosion
description: Orb of Corrosion is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.

name: Falcon Blade
description: Falcon Blade is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.

name: Mystic Staff
description: Mystic Staff is an Item purchasable at the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: Magic Wand
description: Magic Wand is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: Wraith Band
description: Wraith Band is an item purchasable from the Base Shop, under Accessories. It has 2 levels and automatically upgrades based on the in-game clock.
lore_description: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
bonus:
+2/4 Strength
+5/10 Agility
+2/4 Intelligence
+2/4 Armor
+5/10 Attack Speed

name: Soul Ring
description: Soul Ring is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

name: Oblivion Staff
description: Oblivion Staff is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
bonus:
+10 Intelligence
+1.25 Mana Regeneration

name: Phase Boots
description: Phase Boots is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.

bonus:
+4 Armor
+50 Move Speed

+12 Ranged Attack Damage

name: Perseverance
description: Perseverance is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories. However, it is assembled entirely with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: Hand of Midas
description: The Hand of Midas is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

name: Power Treads
description: Power Treads is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
bonus:
+55 Move Speed
+45 Move Speed
+25 Attack Speed

name: Boots of Travel
description: Boots of Travel is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories. It can be upgraded by purchasing the recipe again.
lore_description: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

name: Mask of Madness
description: Mask of Madness is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

name: Helm of the Overlord
description: The Helm of the Overlord is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

+7 Strength
+7 Agility

+7 Armor

name: Ring of Basilius
description: Ring of Basilius is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

name: Urn of Shadows
description: Urn of Shadows is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
bonus:
+2 Strength
+2 Agility
+2 Intelligence
+1.4 Mana Regeneration
+2 Armor

name: Helm of the Dominator
description: The Helm of the Dominator is an upgradable item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Accessories.
lore_description: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
bonus:
+6 Strength
+6 Agility
+6 Intelligence
+6 Health Regeneration
+6 Armor

name: Moon Shard
description: Moon Shard is an item listed at the Base Shop, under Accessories. However, it is assembled entirely with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

name: Medallion of Courage
description: Medallion of Courage is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: The bearer has no fear of combat.

name: Buckler
description: Buckler is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

name: Headdress
description: Headdress is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

name: Tranquil Boots
description: Tranquil Boots is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

name: Pavise
description: Pavise is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.

name: Drum of Endurance
description: Drum of Endurance is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

name: Holy Locket
description: Holy Locket is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

name: Mekansm
description: Mekansm is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

name: Arcane Boots
description: Arcane Boots are an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

name: Vladmir's Offering
description: Vladmir's Offering is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

name: Boots of Bearing
description: Boots of Bearing is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support.
lore_description: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.

+8 Strength
+8 Intelligence
+15 Health Regeneration
+65 Move Speed

name: Guardian Greaves
description: Guardian Greaves is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Support. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

name: Solar Crest
description: Solar Crest is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.

description: Glimmer Cape is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.

name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
description: Eul's Scepter of Divinity is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

name: Witch Blade
description: Witch Blade is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.

+12 Intelligence
+6 Armor
+35 Attack Speed

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Spirit Vessel is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Support. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.

description: The Pipe of Insight is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Support. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

name: Force Staff
description: Force Staff is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

name: Dagon
description: Dagon is an upgradable item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: Veil of Discord
description: Veil of Discord is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: The headwear of corrupt magi.

name: Octarine Core
description: Octarine Core is an item listed at the Main Shop, under Magical. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

+625 Health

name: Aether Lens
description: Aether Lens is an item purchasable at the Main Shop under Magical. However, it requires items from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

name: Rod of Atos
description: Rod of Atos is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

name: Refresher Orb
description: Refresher Orb is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.

name: Gleipnir
description: Gleipnir is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.

name: Vanguard
description: Vanguard is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Armor. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

name: Aghanim's Scepter
description: Aghanim's Scepter is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: Wind Waker
description: Wind Waker is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.

name: Orchid Malevolence
description: Orchid Malevolence is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.

description: Soul Booster is an item listed at the Base Shop, under Armor. However, it is assembled entirely with items from the Secret Shop.

name: Aghanim's Blessing
description: Aghanim's Blessing is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Magical.
lore_description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: Aeon Disk
description: Aeon Disk is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Armor. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A powerful artifact long ago smuggled out of the Ivory Incubarium. Or so many believe.

name: Blade Mail
description: Blade Mail is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Armor.

description: Black King Bar is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Armor.

name: Crimson Guard
description: Crimson Guard is an item listed under the Base Shop under Armor. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.

name: Shiva's Guard
description: Shiva's Guard is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Armor. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

name: Assault Cuirass
description: The Assault Cuirass is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Armor. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

name: Crystalys
description: Crystalys is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons.
lore_description: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

name: Meteor Hammer
description: Meteor Hammer is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: An enchanted hammer forged of metals discovered in the ruins of a village destroyed by a great star storm.
bonus:
+8 Strength
+8 Agility
+8 Intelligence
+6.5 Health Regeneration
+2.5 Mana Regeneration

name: Desolator
description: Desolator is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons.
lore_description: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

name: Nullifier
description: Nullifier is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.
lore_description: A dangerous weapon pilfered from an inverse dimension.

name: Monkey King Bar
description: Monkey King Bar is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Weapons. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

name: Skull Basher
description: Skull Basher is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons.
lore_description: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

name: Shadow Blade
description: Shadow Blade is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Weapons.
lore_description: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

name: Butterfly
description: Butterfly is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Weapons. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

+25 Attack Damage
+30 Attack Speed

description: Battle Fury is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons. However, it requires items from the Secret Shop to be completed.

bonus:

+2.75 Mana Regeneration
+60 Attack Damage

name: Ethereal Blade
description: Ethereal Blade is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons.

description: Radiance is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.

name: Disperser
description: Disperser is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons.

name: Revenant's Brooch
description: Revenant's Brooch is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.

name: Silver Edge
description: Silver Edge is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons.
lore_description: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

name: Abyssal Blade
description: Abyssal Blade is an item purchasable at the Main Shop under Weapons. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.

lore_description: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

name: Divine Rapier
description: Divine Rapier is an item listed at the Base Shop, under Weapons. However, it is assembled entirely with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

name: Kaya

lore_description: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

name: Arcane Blink
description: Arcane Blink is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Arcane. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.

name: Satanic
description: Satanic is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Artifacts. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

name: Eye of Skadi
description: Eye of Skadi is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Artifacts. However, it is assembled entirely with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

name: Kaya and Sange
description: Kaya and Sange is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Artifacts.

lore_description: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

name: Mjollnir
description: Mjollnir is an item purchasable at the Base Shop, under Artifacts. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

name: Arcane Ring
description: Arcane Ring is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.

name: Duelist Gloves
description: Duelist Gloves is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Heaven's Halberd
description: Heaven's Halberd is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Artifacts. However, it requires an item from the Secret Shop to be completed.

name: Broom Handle
description: Broom Handle is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

name: Swift Blink
description: Swift Blink is an item purchasable at the Main Shop, under Arcane. However, it can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop.
lore_description: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.

name: Occult Bracelet
description: Occult Bracelet is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A band that bears effigy of the dark goddess Eloshar's unsleeping eye.

name: Lance of Pursuit
description: Lance of Pursuit is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: The gleaming weapon of a tarnished knight haunted by his duties to an unworthy king.

name: Pig Pole
description: Pig Pole is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.

name: Spark of Courage
description: Spark of Courage is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Seeds of Serenity
description: Seeds of Serenity is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: An evergreen sprout treasured by the woodkin and highly coveted by interlopers and their like.

name: Faded Broach
description: Faded Broach was a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

name: Fairy's Trinket
description: The Fairy's Trinket is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.

+75 Health
+5% Mana Loss Reduction
+5% Spell Damage Amp

name: Eye of the Vizier
description: Eye of the Vizier is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: The ring of a cunning court mage who imprisoned a cadre of enemies to serve as his personal mana reserve.

name: Dragon Scale
description: Dragon Scale is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.

name: Tumbler's Toy
description: Tumbler's Toy is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.

name: Trusty Shovel
description: Trusty Shovel is a Tier 1 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.

name: Bullwhip
description: Bullwhip is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.

name: Pupil's Gift
description: Pupil's Gift is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.

name: Gossamer Cape
description: Gossamer Cape is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Grove Bow
description: Grove Bow is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.

name: Orb of Destruction
description: Orb of Destruction was a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: Philosopher's Stone is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

name: Ring of Aquila
description: Ring of Aquila is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

name: Vampire Fangs
description: Vampire Fangs was a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

description: Ceremonial Robe is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.

name: Vambrace
description: Vambrace is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Dandelion Amulet

name: Ogre Seal Totem
description: Ogre Seal Totem is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A totem carved from an ogre seal's tooth.

name: Elven Tunic
description: Elven Tunic is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Enchanted Quiver
description: Enchanted Quiver is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

name: Specialist's Array
description: Specialist's Array is a Tier 2 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Defiant Shell
description: Defiant Shell is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Cloak of Flames
description: Cloak of Flames is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

name: Psychic Headband
description: Psychic Headband is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

description: Titan Sliver is a Tier 3 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

description: Martyr's Plate is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

description: Ascetic's Cap is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.

name: Penta-Edged Sword
description: Penta-Edged Sword is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Apex
description: Apex is a Tier 5 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Ninja Gear
description: Ninja Gear is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.

name: Spell Prism
description: Spell Prism is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.

name: Telescope
description: Telescope is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.

name: Arcanist's Armor
description: Arcanist's Armor is a Tier 5 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.

name: Stormcrafter
description: Stormcrafter is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.

name: Trickster Cloak
description: Trickster Cloak is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

name: Book of Shadows
description: Book of Shadows is a Tier 5 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
lore_description: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.

name: Timeless Relic
description: Timeless Relic is a Tier 4 neutral item dropped by neutral creeps.
